des: "This is a fabulously delicious and easy-to-make dressing.  My kids will even eat salad when I put this dressing on it.  It is also good on veggies, crackers, in soup, and on toasted pita bread.  I love this stuff!"
ins: Place the miso paste, water, vegetable oil, onion, honey, and white vinegar into a blender. Blend until smooth. Transfer the dressing to an airtight container and refrigerate until ready to use.
